main.name: Rahul Sahastrabuddhe
main.bio: Dedicated Cloud Security Engineer with a Master's in Computer Science from UT Dallas, leveraging expertise honed at Credit Karma to create a secure infrastructure. Committed to advancing cybersecurity, I bring to the table safeguarding web endpoints, internal infrastructure, security automations.
main.background: About 1.5 years of Security Engineering experience and almost 3 years of Software Engineering experience.
main.contactmessage: Want to hire me. Please contact below it works perfectly.

education.description: Took advance knowledge of Big Data, Cloud Security, Database Design, Web Programming Language, Machine Learning, Algorithms, Object Oriented Analysis and Design, etc.
Build my basic foundation in computer science filed by learning subjects like Operating Systems, Data Structure, OOPs, DB Design, etc.

work.title: Cloud Security Engineer - III
description: Working in the Cloud Infrastructure team to help Credit Karma a secure place for our customers by implementing security measures at various places such as securing the web endpoints by implementing web access firewalls, securing internal tools and processes, implemting automations.

work.title: Security Engineering Intern
description: Working towards creating a software which scans through all the Google Engine Virtual machines for cleartext secrets and warn the Security Operations Center team for any of such incidents.
Managing the deployment of the software on cloud virtual machines environment in a master-minion way using Saltstack.

Involved in development of Diagnostic tools to test the automotive ECUs with a team of five associates for Ford Motor Company.
